languages.text: "Сколь надменен и самодоволен может быть грешник..." {n}Священник в черном осуждающе качает головой. Затем устремляет взгляд на вас.{/n} "Я — преподобный отец Иеронимус Скорбный, глава миссии {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцев{/g} на Футфоле. Благодарю тебя, что вмешал{mf|ся|ась}. Приходи, когда найдется время — побеседуем".

traits.locale_text: "Сколь надменен и самодоволен может быть грешник..." {n}Священник в черном осуждающе качает головой. Затем устремляет взгляд на вас.{/n} "Я — преподобный отец Иеронимус Скорбный, глава миссии друзианцев на Футоле. Благодарю тебя, что вмешал{mf|ся|ась}. Приходи, когда найдется время — побеседуем".

languages.text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."
languages.original_text: "Сколь надменен и самодоволен может быть грешник..." {n}Священник в черном осуждающе качает головой. Затем устремляет взгляд на вас.{/n} "Я — преподобный отец Иеронимус Скорбный, глава миссии {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцев{/g} на Футфоле. Благодарю тебя, что вмешал{mf|ся|ась}. Приходи, когда найдется время — побеседуем".

traits.locale_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a sinner..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Father Hieronimus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

"The arrogance and self-righteousness of a sinner..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Father Hieronimus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

"The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

languages.text: 「傲慢にも悪人の独善にすぎぬ…」{n}司祭は残念そうに頭を横に振る。そして、こちらに視線を向けた。{/n}「ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭、ここフットフォールの{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルシアン{/g}聖務団の長です。介入してくださりありがとうございます。お時間がある際に、私に会いに来てください…詳しいことはその時にお話ししましょう」
languages.original_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: 「傲慢にも悪人の独善にすぎぬ…」{n}司祭は残念そうに頭を横に振る。そして、こちらに視線を向けた。{/n}「ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭、ここフットフォールの{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルシアン{/g}聖務団の長です。介入してくださりありがとうございます。お時間がある際に、私に会いに来てください…詳しいことはその時にお話ししましょう」

languages.text: “自以为是的傲慢恶人……”{n}牧师不赞同地摇了摇头，随后将目光转向你。{/n}“我是希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师，是落脚港{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}布道所的负责人。感谢你出手相助。等你有空的时候，请来见我一面吧，我们到时再谈。”
languages.original_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: “自以为是的傲慢恶人……”{n}牧师不赞同地摇了摇头，随后将目光转向你。{/n}“我是希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师，是落脚港{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}布道所的负责人。感谢你出手相助。等你有空的时候，请来见我一面吧，我们到时再谈。”

languages.text: «La arrogancia y la prepotencia propias de un malhechor...». {n}El sacerdote sacude la cabeza con desaprobación. Luego dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n}. «Soy el reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, responsable de la misión {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g} de Paso. Gracias por intervenir. Venga a verme cuando tenga tiempo y hablaremos tranquilamente».
languages.original_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: «La arrogancia y la prepotencia propias de un malhechor...». {n}El sacerdote sacude la cabeza con desaprobación. Luego dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n}. «Soy el reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, responsable de la misión {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g} de Paso. Gracias por intervenir. Venga a verme cuando tenga tiempo y hablaremos tranquilamente».

languages.text: « L'arrogance et la suffisance d'un scélérat... » {n}Le prêtre secoue la tête d'un air désapprobateur, puis son regard se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Je suis le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso, chef de la mission {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusienne{/g} de Castel. Merci pour votre intervention. Passez me voir quand vous en aurez le temps, nous discuterons à ce moment-là. »
languages.original_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: « L'arrogance et la suffisance d'un scélérat... » {n}Le prêtre secoue la tête d'un air désapprobateur, puis son regard se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Je suis le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso, chef de la mission {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusienne{/g} de Castel. Merci pour votre intervention. Passez me voir quand vous en aurez le temps, nous discuterons à ce moment-là. »

languages.text: "Die Arroganz und Selbstgerechtigkeit eines Frevlers ..." {n}Der Priester schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf. Dann blickt er dich an.{/n} "Ich bin Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, Oberhaupt der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}-Mission hier auf Footfall. Danke für Eure Intervention. Bitte besucht mich doch, wenn Ihr Zeit habt – dann können wir reden."
languages.original_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: "Die Arroganz und Selbstgerechtigkeit eines Frevlers ..." {n}Der Priester schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf. Dann blickt er dich an.{/n} "Ich bin Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, Oberhaupt der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}-Mission hier auf Footfall. Danke für Eure Intervention. Bitte besucht mich doch, wenn Ihr Zeit habt – dann können wir reden."

languages.text: "Ah şu suçlulara has kibir ve kendini beğenmişlik." {n}Rahip, onaylamaz bir tavırla başını sallıyor. Ardından gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Ben Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso, Binliman'daki {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusus{/g} misyonunun önderiyim. Araya girdiğin için teşekkür ederim. Zaman bulduğunda lütfen yanıma uğra, biraz sohbet ederiz."
languages.original_text: "The arrogance and self-righteousness of a malefactor..." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly. Then his eyes shift to you.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission here on Footfall. I thank you for stepping in. Please come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlulara özgü kibir ve kendini beğenmişlik." {n}Rahip onaylamayan bir tavırla başını sallıyor, ardından gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Ben Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso, Binliman'daki {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusus{/g} misyonunun lideriyim. Araya girdiğin için teşekkür ederim. Zaman bulduğunda lütfen yanıma uğra, biraz sohbet edelim."
